scene.name: intro
scene.option: Lula said you could direct us to the ... church?
Be straight with me. What is this place?

scene.name: what-is-this-place
scene.line: Just another office, lady. Just another job.
scene.option: But you kicked out a congregation to set up your office?
Lula said you could direct us to the church?

scene.name: congregation
scene.line: I wasn't here for that. But, yeah, I get where you're coming from. Still, I wouldn't judge until I'd seen everything. They've got a new church now, the Bureau set it up for them out of some of their old storage space. I'm sure it's very nice.

scene.name: church
scene.line: Oh, sure. The old storage lot.

scene.name: church-directions
scene.line: Just get back on the |Zero| and drive until you hit the crystal. Then turn around.
It'll make sense once you get on the road. You can handle it.
